item.title: [DISTRELEC-3370] No confirmation e-mail after checkout
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Enterprise
Browser: IE 8.0.7601.17514
URL: https://test.distrelec.ch/checkout/orderConfirmation/00001RAZ

Add some articles to the cart, register as new B2B customer, select ship to another adress, payment: invoice, send order, confirmation page is appearing but no e-mail will send to the inbox. (img_457/458_pzu)

Created user: distrelec.testing+995@gmail.com, pw: distrelec.

comments.comment: Same behaviour on my side.

Yes, there was a problem while rendering the e-mail. That's strange since I have fixed exactly this missing RendererTemplate problem in DISTRELEC-3339. So I did not changed any code or configuration...

I have restarted the failing mail send process (you should have received the missing mail for order 00001RAZ.
I re-tested as mentioned in the description above and received the ordered confirmation 00001S6A successfully.

Please re-test from your side again. Thank you.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3362] CC-Payment // Ref.-NR wird @shop nicht neu generiert.
item.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Place order via CC with incorrect details.
2. Place same order again via CC with correct details.
-> Error "REFNR EXIST"

Das bedeutet, dass die Bestellnummer bei DeuCS hinterlegt bleibt, wenn eine Bestellung per CC fehlschlägt. Wenn dann nochmal eine Bestellung gemacht wird mit demselben Account, ist bei DeuCS die Referenznummer noch hinterlegt und die Bestellung wird abgelehnt. Es müsst also immer wieder eine neue Bestellnummer generiert werden.
item.summary: CC-Payment // Ref.-NR wird @shop nicht neu generiert.

comments.comment: Here are the Screenshots from DeuCS-Backend. It doesn't matter the test-cart has been used for this example I could just recreate the issue with my private card.

Guten Tag Herr Gramlich


Bei dem Produktiv-System von Distrelec ist ein Problem aufgetaucht.

Wenn man eine gültige Kreditkarte eingibt, aber eine falsche CCV bekommt man einen Fehler.
Wenn man danach mit der richtigen CCV bezahlen will, bekommt man den Fehler: REFNR EXIST.

Mit dem Test-Mandanten, können wir diese Problem nicht reproduzieren.


Wir sind davon ausgegangen, dass wir die selbe REFNR schicken, solange es sich um die selbe Bestellung handelt,
auch wenn ein Fehler bei der Bezahlung aufgetreten ist, ist das falsch?


Freundliche Grüsse
René Hämmerli

Guten Tag Herr Gramlich

Vielen Dank für die rasche Antwort.

Das Verhalten ist meiner Meinung nach nicht konsistent.

Wenn ich zuerst den Fehler: INVALID CARDNUMBER bekomme,
kann ich danach mit der selben REFNR die Bezahlung abschliessen.

Bei einer Falschen CCV geht das nicht.


Diesen Fehler kann man so auf dem Testsystem nicht nachvollziehen,
weil dort auch bei richtigen Kreditkarten die CCV nicht überprüft wird.


Freundlich Grüsse
René Hämmerli

Movex Interface
- Pattern: {ordernr}{year}{month}{hour}{minute}{second}
- Field: Credit card number | WCC01 | A | 20 | 893 | 912 | Reference number DeuCS
(20 Stellen)

Hallo Herr Hämmerli,

wir hatten ja soeben schon telefoniert.
Noch ein Hinweis zu dem Parameter <ReqID>. Sollte unsere System eine Transaktion mit identischer <ReqID> erneut erhalten, dann wird der Kunde das Ergebnis des ersten Vorganges erneut erhalten und auf die entsprechende URL weiter geleitet werden. Hiermit können Doppelzahlungen verhindert werden.

Um das erneute Absenden des Zahlformulars zu verhindern, haben wir Händler die einen Rücksprung im Browser auf das Zahlformular verhindern.

Viele Grüße,

Hallo Herr Gramlich

Danke für den Hinweis.

Wie besprochen als Attachment, ein Log welches eine Bezahlung mit den Test-Mandanten (pg_50702t) Zeigt:
- Zuerst mit einer Ungültigen CC
- Dann mit der korrekten CC

Beide male mit der selben RefNr (00000A18).
Ohne den Fehler REFNR EXIST zu bekommen.

<evopay_log.txt>

Wie gesagt, weiss ich noch nicht, wie ich diesen Fehler auf dem Test-Mandanten reproduzieren kann.


Freundlich Grüsse
René Hämmerli
done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3344] Selected filter doesn't returns no result
item.description:
When searching for Kondensator and putting a filter on Kapazität, e.g. 1.8 showing which should show 7 products we get a no result screen.

You can try almost any value in this facet in live and test.

Doesn't matter if you go down in the subcategories or filter just after the search result, same behavior occurs.

We have another ticket which proves that this filter worked just after the golive (DISTRELEC-3169).
item.summary: Selected filter doesn't returns no result

comments.comment: @Cornel: Can you please have a look at this ticket.

I have checked this. The displayed facet values and the FACT-Finder request when a facet value is selected seem to be fine.

Response from FACT-Finder with facet values:
...
<GroupElement xsi:type="GroupElement">
<active>false</active>
<associatedFieldName>Kapazität~~nF</associatedFieldName>
<clusterLevel>0</clusterLevel>
<name>1.8</name>
<previewImageURL xsi:nil="true"/>
<recordCount>11</recordCount>
<refKey xsi:nil="true"/>
<searchParams xsi:type="Params">
</searchParams>
...
<selected>false</selected>
</GroupElement>
...

Request by Backend with filter:
...
<ns2:filters>
    <ns2:Filter>
        <ns2:name>Kapazität~~nF</ns2:name>
        <ns2:valueList>
            <ns2:FilterValue>
                <ns2:type>or</ns2:type>
                <ns2:value>1.8</ns2:value>
            </ns2:FilterValue>
        </ns2:valueList>
    </ns2:Filter>
</ns2:filters>
...

The following FACT-Finder response does NOT contain any products anymore.

@Raphael: Could you please verify why FACT-Finder returns a zero result set for previously proposed facet values?

Cornel and me have a finding:
- Values in the PIM import can have suffix or prefix tags. Ex.: <Value AttributeID="Kapazitaet_emb_F" UnitID="unece.unit.4O"><prefix> </prefix>0.1<suffix> </suffix></Value>
- In earlier exports the value was like this <Value AttributeID="Kapazitaet_emb_F" UnitID="unece.unit.4O">0.1</Value>
- The prefix definition ends in a value that has a white space in front. This white space will be replaced with a + sign for proper urls, but this value has than no match again if you select the facet.

@Önder: Please remove such prefix/suffix definitions for emb values, especially for numeric ones. When it is fixed, please run an export.

If we have the corrected export we have to import the file and run an new FF export. Than the selection should work again.

ohne <prefix> und <suffix>
        <MultiValue AttributeID="AusgangLogik_emb_mA">
          <Value UnitID="unece.unit.4K">max.20@ 5 V</Value>
        </MultiValue>

mit <prefix> und <suffix>
        <MultiValue AttributeID="AusgangLogik_emb_mA">
          <Value UnitID="unece.unit.4K"><prefix> max</prefix> .20<suffix> @ 5 V</suffix></Value>
        </MultiValue>

Since this is a blocker....
Who is doing what until when?

@Cornel: As discussed on the phone. Please adjust the PIM import so that it can handle the prefix and suffix.
We will not use this information. So we just need the value in between.

PIM import has been updated.

Raphael, I've assigned the ticket to you to cooridnate the data quality issue regarding the attribute units.
I changed the unit export. From now on, convertible units of all units referenced by Feature values will be exported.

During import, we will trim the leading/trailing spaces of feature values. Since the import would take a very long time, we are going to change the values directly on database level.
SQL statements performed using a Tomcat (9001) connection to avoid Proxy timeout. Statement runs around 5 minutes.
- HP-Q: http://10.191.21.140:9001/hac/console/flexsearch
- HP-P: http://10.191.20.140:9001/hac/console/flexsearch

SELECT count(*)
FROM productfeatures
WHERE DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(p_stringvalue,1) = ' '

UPDATE productfeatures
SET p_stringvalue = TRIM(p_stringvalue)
WHERE DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(p_stringvalue,1) = ' '

HQ-Q: 354048 replaced.
HP-P: ( pending ??? )

This procedure has to be performed again after the deployment of v1.1.1 because we are currently still importing PIM data (that contain leading spaces)!

PIM import (remove leading/trailing spaces) as well as unit export (workaround for attributes with multiple base units) are part of the v1.1.1 release.
We have successfully tested a simulation of the new behavior (remove spaces directly in the DB / generate a unit export via BeanShell).

What is that?

Removed the <h2> which was for screenreader purposes but not really necessary.

I also removed it from the Cert Labels.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3304] Password vergessen - error 500 on AT live website
item.description: https://www.distrelec.at/login/pw/request
item.summary: Password vergessen - error 500 on AT live website

comments.comment:
The improvement DISTRELEC-3097 (deployed in v1.0.9) is causing this error.
The same problem also happen in the v1.1 version (trunk) and has already been fixed (see DISTRELEC-3249).

However, I talked to Nabil and he will apply the fix in the v1.0 branch, too.
The problem will NOT occur if the user performs (a failing) login before trying to reset the password. So Florian will check the priority again.

Hi,

I fixed the problem and committed my changes to the branche v1.0. The fix should be available for the next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3272] French and Italian Translations from the HMC, at Atos test
item.description:
Situation is the folowing:

  • Nabil imported the existing translation in Italian and French
  • all translations are in the HMC
  • on the test enviorment , nothing is shown unless
  • the labeles are searched in the HMC
  • edited, modified, saved
  • edited, delete the modification, saved

Example:

on page: https://test.a.distrelec.ch/register/b2c

Password Strength is in English

In HMC, this is translated.

If

  • edited, modified, saved
  • edited, delete the modification, saved

these words will be modified, and the translation will be in place.

Please fix asap this error, as we need to proofread!!!
item.summary: French and Italian Translations from the HMC, at Atos test

comments.comment: Could you please check this?
Pascal, according to Florian, there is a definition problem in the hMC. Please can you look at this?

it's a caching issue of the spring message properties. the values are loaded to memory at the time they were english.

reboot of the server will help.
Please reboot

Hi,

The problem does not come from the cache because if we switch to german we wont have this problem. The problem is only with french (on the swiss website).

BTW, I rebooted the nodes but the problem remains.
There was a synchronization problem. I've deleted all online MessageResourceTableEntry for CH and run the sync job again. shoud be fixed now.
Nabil, please verify
I've tested the french Locale and it seems to work now.

Hi Pascal!

same problem exists on HP Q. Please fix this asap.

Thanks!
Hi Oana, please check. Thanks

Hi Pascal!

see the 2 print screens. One is from Atos (with more French), the other one is at HP.

Thanks!
please reload your site with CTRL+F5 (I get the french values as you can see on my printscreen)
short update: we've identified a bug in the i18n extension and are working on a fix/workaround.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3224] Registration Forms: Password field reset without notification if captcha validation fails
item.description:
On all login forms (B2B, B2C):

  • fill in all required fields
  • leave captcha empty or enter wrong string
  • send the form
    => registration fails, a notification appears next to captcha field (OK)
    => and the password field is empty, but without a notification

SOLUTION

  • If the password fields are emptied after a form validation, this should be indicated by a validation message on both password fields
item.summary: Registration Forms: Password field reset without notification if captcha validation fails

comments.comment: I've added the message only to the main password field to reduce the impact to other validation logic.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3209] Login problems with migrated users
item.description:
If I change the username of a migrated user in the HMC the login won't work anymore. After rename to the old username it will work again.

Test:
User: szuchomelli
PW: 123456

to
User: szuchomellib2c
PW: 123456

comments.comment:
Tested:
- yes, changing the ID will lead to the new ID (as well as the old ID) not working as a login
- yes, changing it back makes the old login work again

Furthermore:
- after login with the working Login ("szuchomelli") and opening the login data in my account, the "current login" is indicated as "szuchomelliB2B". So the actually usable login does not correspond with the one listed in my account! (see screenshots)

Dishan,
can you please analyze the problem? Please align with Adi if needed or to discuss findings.

The solution to the riddle is the following:
The passwords are hashed (among other things) with the user name. So the password needs to be reset after the username is changed.
This only applies if the user name is changed in the HMC. If the user changes it himself while logged in in my account, the password is re-hashed by the service layer.

@Nando: Correct. If you change the uid in the hMC than the login will not work anymore, because the password hash includes the uid, a salt and the password. If you change the uid in the hMC the password hash gets not calculated newly and so the suer is not able to login anymore. Unfortunately we can not change that, because we have to knew the password of the customer to calculate the new hash and this information is not available.
So just the user itself is able to change its uid!

Ok, so the final verdict is:

- ID can only be changed by the user in my account
- If it needs to be changed by the backoffice, they need to do the following:
-- change the ID
-- change the UID to the same value
-- save
-- reset the password
-- inform the customer about the new login and password and ask him to change the password after login
- No code change required, resolving this ticket.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3207] Zusätzlichen Filter hinzufügen not working for some Filters

http://www.distrelec.at/de/Automation/Drahtlose-Kommunikation/WLAN/WLAN-Antennen/c/cat-66020?q=*&filter_Category4=WLAN-Antennen&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Manufacturer=Huber%2BSuhner

comments.comment: Status?

Hallo Cornel

Wir hatten ja schon ein anderes Ticket dazu. Kannst du mir sagen was der Status ist? Weil dieses Beispiel funktioniert noch nicht.
This issue has already been fixed with the Ticket DISTRELEC-3171. The fix will be deployed with the next 1.1.x release.

We can not use those from the shop because they are too wide (960px) and have a grey background.

Please attach them to this ticket, thank you!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3036] Subuser overview: Wrong field name

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2954] CH: Login -> Http 500 Error
item.description:
When trying to Login at test.distrelec.ch with following user a Http 500 error occured. See attached Screenshot.

Error-URL: https://test.distrelec.ch/j_spring_security_check
user: distrelec.testing+test@gmail.com
pw: 123456

comments.comment: Browser Firefox 26.0, Could be related to proxy issue from Atos. Please investigate.

Rafael,
I could log in fine with that customer.
Was it a one-time error or is it persistent on your machine?
Now it works - so it was a one time error.
as discussed
can not reproduce
add some configurations to suppress the ugly default error page and redirect to the maintainable hybris error page. so it's possible to promote some products instead of a stacktrace ;)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2950] Facebook sign is not correctly displayed on product detail page
item.description: The css class ".skin-toolsitem-fblike iframe" has a max-width defined which is to less.
item.summary: Facebook sign is not correctly displayed on product detail page

comments.comment:
Note: the width is too small for German, it is fine for English. I don't know about French.
=> Can the position of the subsequent icons (share, print) be dynamics relative wo the with of the facebook share button?

We do not know the width, because it is an iFrame. It depends on the language and the like count.

I increased the width from 96px to 140px, see Screenshot.

Please switch the position: Share and print on the left where the facebook icon is at the moment; and the facebook icon just next to the print icon.
Goal: no distance between the icons.
I fixed the order as requested. this bug is labelled R1.1 -> the width change (mentioned by dominic) however is currently implemented only in R1.0
Sorry, Beat, that was my mistake - can you please move this change from 1.1 to 1.0?
@ Beat: Habe die FB width soeben eingecheckt
fixed, can be tested after deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2904] Distrelec Bestellung E-Mail - Modify Subject
item.description:
We should be able to identify that the e-mail comes from Distrelec.

For that I would change the subject to "Distrelec Bestellungen".

Hope this is in a property file

comments.comment: Sorry Raphael. I serached for 'emailSubject' or 'Subject' and I ahve found 16 results in the HMC but non was the Subject for the Order Confirmation e-Mail.

As I told you today morning: You can editing the mail templates in the hMC. System --> Output Documents --> Communication Templates
But please send me your correction as well, so that I can include them in the Subversion. Otherwise we probably overwrite your changes during a deployment.
all subjects of all e-mails were modified.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2873] m.test.distrelec.at - dns error
item.description: Momentan kommt unter m.test.distrelec.at wieder ein dns error. Am morgen funktionierte es noch. Nach dem Lunch nicht mehr. Gestern war schon das gleiche Verhalten zu beobachten. Woran liegt das?

comments.comment:
Der DNS lookup scheint OK zu sein:

nslookup m.test.distrelec.at
Server: 10.2.7.20
Address: 10.2.7.20#53

Non-authoritative answer:
m.test.distrelec.at canonical name = distrelec-test-01.sevenval-fit.com.
Name: distrelec-test-01.sevenval-fit.com
Address: 81.173.210.118

The DNS "m.test.distrelec.at" is hosted by managed-ip.

It points to: "distrelec-test-01.sevenval-fit.com" which is hosted by "7val.com"

Please check with them.
Sevenval prüft dies.
Any update on this ticket, has the issue been resolved?

Sevenval konnte von Ihrer Seite aus keinen Fehler finden.
Ich konnte noch folgendes feststellen:
Es scheint wahllos nicht zu funktionieren. (Könnte auf Session-Basis auftreten)

Könnte es evt. sein, dass die Browser-Weiche nur auf dem Apache einer Instanz eingerichtet ist?

Hallo Rafael

Du hast geschrieben, das Problem sein ein "dns error".
Das kann nicht von der Weiche kommen.

Kannst du mir einen Print Screen vom Fehler machen?

Danke

Hallo Rene,

Hier die Fehlermeldung(gerade eben, vor ca. 1h gings noch).

Gruss
Update: Auf CH gehts aktuell, AT nicht.

Hallo Rafael

Mindestens einer der DNS Server von Sevenval scheint nicht richtig konfiguriert zu sein:


GUT:
nslookup distrelec-test-01.sevenval-fit.com ns6.7val.com
Server: ns6.7val.com
Address: 87.79.3.40#53

Name: distrelec-test-01.sevenval-fit.com
Address: 81.173.210.118



SCHLECHT:
 nslookup distrelec-test-01.sevenval-fit.com ns7.7val.com
Server: ns7.7val.com
Address: 81.173.210.83#53

*** Can't find distrelec-test-01.sevenval-fit.com: No answer






Verantwortliche DNS Server:
sevenval-fit.com nameserver = ns7.7val.com.
sevenval-fit.com nameserver = ns6.7val.com.
Vielen Dank, Rene.
Issue solved - Sevenval updated DNS config on one of their servers.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2724] Wrong link in confirmation email for "change profile"
item.description:
The link the confirmation email to change you profile still goes to the old website.

It seems that the + in the email is also lost on the way.

Should be this email: distrelec.testing+6-newsletter@gmail.com
Is this email: distrelec.testing 6-newsletter@gmail.com
item.summary: Wrong link in confirmation email for "change profile"

comments.comment:
1) the thing with the wrong link in the email is handled by DISTRELEC-1730 and could be processed if I get an answer to my mail (sent 17.01.14 and as reminder 24.01.14)

2) the missing "+" has nothing to do with our new shop system. it's a bug between the communication/processing of Optivo and your current shop.

Gibt leider keine Möglichkeit einen separaten Double Opt in Prozess zu erstellen.
Q? Prod?

Optivo kann diese Tokens wenn wir diese haben in den Listen einspielen. Wie genau möchtest du die Tokens erstellen?

Oana,

Hi Florian!
